summary: SummaryMAC Brushstroke Eyeliner is a liquid eyeliner pen with a precision-brush tip that wears strong all day long for 24 hours. Smudge-proof and budge-resistant, this eyeliner offers superior, intense color in black or brown that wears strong all day long, yet removes with just warm water.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-wearing, 24 hoursFeatures easy and precise liningFeatures rich, intense colorSmudge-proofTransfer-resistantWater-resistantSweat- and humidity-proofOphthalmologist-testedSafe for contact lens wearersRemoves easily with warm waterFeaturesMistake-proof, tapered-tip pen creates the perfect line - thick or thin - in one sweepFor the finest line, use the brush tipFor a bolder one, try the brush's flat sideAdd a painterly touch to eye liner applicationBrushstroke Eyeliner features a precision brush tip that makes liquid lining sharp, fast and easyFormulated WithoutFragranceOilFormaldehydeHydroquinoneTriclosanCoal TarTolueneSodium Laureth SulfateGlutenPhthalateParabenMineral OilPetrolatumPolyethyleneLauryl SulfateOxybenzoneItem 2510886How To UseApply eyeliner directly to lash line.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sucrose Palmitate, Simethicone, Sorbitan Laurate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Sorbitan Trioleate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Aminomethyl Propanol, Beheneth-30, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Black 2 (CI 77266), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).Please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply eyeliner directly to lash line.

reviews.headline: Very pleased
reviews.comments: Love the ease of application on my crepey, hooded eyes.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This eyeliner is great! Easy to remove, none flaking, and stays in place all day.

reviews.headline: Just what I needed!
reviews.comments: I'm all about eyeliner instead of mascara, but most  pencils trigger my ticklish eyelids, wear off halfway through the day, and don't have the oomph I need. This product is perfect! I've even used the superfine brush tip to fill in a gap in my eyebrow. A great product.

reviews.headline: Honest Mac Eyeliner Review!
reviews.comments: This product is good it works, it last if you love mac products this is a good one as well. Its only easy take off if your heavy heavy crying, or using makeup remover wipes, or the garnier micellar water remover/waterproof makeup remover. Yes while the price can be expensive to alot of people I would recommend Nyx as a cheaper one also good but this one is better in my opinion. Love Mac!

reviews.headline: Worst liquid eyeliner!
reviews.comments: I'm shocked that MAC would come out with such a poor liquid eyeliner. I stopped by Ulta to look for a brown liquid eyeliner and the store associate recommended this to me. It has absolutely zero pay-off and is a very faded brown color. I had to go over it with mt NYX Epic Liner! Very disappointed, don't get it.

reviews.headline: Worst liquid eyeliner!
reviews.comments: I'm shocked that MAC would come out with such a poor liquid eyeliner. I stopped by Ulta to look for a brown liquid eyeliner and the store associate recommended this to me. It has absolutely zero pay-off and is a very faded brown color. I had to go over it with mt NYX Epic Liner! Very disappointed, don't get it.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: Id been wanting the brown liner for some time and as soon as i got it when i tried it on it was a very vague color. Its not as dark or solid of a brown youd think itd be. Its kind of buildable but even then it smears so easily. I put in on 1 hour ago just to see the color already fading so i just wiped it softly and everything came off. Not waterproof either! For 25 youre better off getting a NYX or elf liner.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't go on my eyelids
reviews.comments: Returned it because it wouldn't go on my eyelids smoothly.  Gal at store said they have at least one a week returned. ( not specifically this brand, but this product).  Purchased a different product at a depth store and works great

reviews.headline: Brown isn't Quite Brown
reviews.comments: I bought this eyeliner because I had heard such great reviews about the black liner.  I rarely wear black eyeliner now so I had hoped the brown would be great too. It's average. It goes on well - no pull/tugging. However, it's not 24 hour wear. It lasts maybe a couple hours tops.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: The bedt eyeliner to ever exist

reviews.headline: Not Worth the Price Tag
reviews.comments: It feels like it's already dried out when I go to apply it, even though it was brand-new out of the box, having to make many passes to get a solid line out of the tip. I usually like Mac products, but I will not be buying this again.

reviews.headline: Worth the price!
reviews.comments: So this line is pricier than I'd like, but so far has been well worth it. I'm on my second one. This liner is easy to apply, it's dark, and does not smear throughout the day. It stays put!  It doesn't irritate my eyes and is easy yo remove.  That all for me has been hard to find all in one liner. And my last pen lasted for a very very long time and stayed dark. Worth paying extra for.

reviews.headline: Dried out after 5 uses
reviews.comments: I prefer the clinique easy liquid eyeliner, but unfortunately had to purchase this instead since my local store was out of stock at the time. I used this maybe 5 times and it has already dried out. Made sure the cap was on tight and everything. Not sure if I just got a faulty one, but this is way too expensive to be dealing with such poor quality.

reviews.headline: Best Long Lasting Eye Liner
reviews.comments: This is the best long wear eye liner I have found so far. I have oily eye lids so I use a good eye primer and after giving it a minute or two to dry, I apply this Mac eyeliner. It's so much easier to work with than the Mac's liquid liner. But both this one and the liquid liner really ARE long lasting!

reviews.headline: Not Even 8 Hours
reviews.comments: Horrible eye liner!  Doesnt even last the day at work.

reviews.headline: My go to liner
reviews.comments: Used this eyeliner on all my clients. Liner is super long lasting. I have yet to come across a liner that keeps on giving as much as this one has. The only con is that you have to apply multiple layers for extra black effect but even after reapplying, it still doesn't run out as quickly as other brands do. Every now and then I try another eyeliner for personal use but I always return to Mac.

reviews.headline: Mac liquid eyeliner
reviews.comments: I don't like that is doesn't stay I places

reviews.headline: not bad for a novice user
reviews.comments: I usually skip eyeliner, so I am a novice.  I can get a passable result with powdered eyeshadow and a dampened super-fine eyeliner brush (or a flattened push brush), but it is a painstaking process for me.  MAC Brushstroke (Brushback color) is faster and easier for me to apply.  The line isn't quite as precise or as fine as with a push brush, but the result seems more crisp than with the black eyeliner pencils I've tried.  It is easier for me to draw a wing with its pointed-flex applicator tip than with a firm pencil, too.  I've only used this on my upper lash line, and it stays on better than expected.  It seems rub-proof, so when I make a mistake, it takes a wet cotton bud and a decent amount of pressure to fix it; it does wash off easily with my usual foaming cleanser.  I haven't noticed anything irritating about the formulation.  So far, so good.

reviews.headline: A must have
reviews.comments: This product is the best of its kind. It is truly a must have and last very long. You get a perfect black line there is no skipping or dryness . I would buy this forever

reviews.headline: Great Eyeliner
reviews.comments: I've been using this MAC eyeliner for years.  Not only is it easy to apply, does not smudge, but stays on nicely.  The eyeliner pen itself last a pretty long time, this may be because of how a store it, always facing downward in my caddy.  Recommend

Lasted over a year with great application

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have ALWAYS had trouble with eyeliners living up to their long lasting promises and/or eyeliners transferring to create raccoon eyes under my bottom lid...SO FRUSTRATING! Until I happily discovered that MAC came out with the BRUSTROKE LINER! This is by leaps & bounds the best liquid marker eyeliner out there and I swear I've tried them all! As long as you treat it like a marker in your hand & take your time, you basically cannot make a mistake! I can make the thinnest, most delicate line or the thickest, most bold line I choose, it's kind of the choose your own adventure of eye liners! If I mess up, it's quite easy to fix either by going over it again with another stroke or using a q-tip to fix my flub...it typically does not smudge everywhere as long as I am careful not to drag it. It's all in the care you take though, as with anything...you need to slow down, stay close to your lash line, make sure you're light-handed to start (you can always add more...it's harder to subtract if you do too much!) and you'll be good to go! I am the costume and makeup director for a dance company and this liner POPS on stage. Enough gushing...you MUST try this product if you love a no muss, no fuss, perfect, rich, bold black defined eye! (unless you're using the brown...which gives good color too, I just tend to used the black more regularly.)

My ONLY complaint is that there aren't enough color options...I am ALWAYS looking for a good dark purple liner in this formulation with the same lasting power and maybe a dark green. PRETTY PLEASE MAC...MAKE MORE COLORS IN THE BRUSTROKE LINER!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: BEST LIQUID LINER EVER MADE! NEVER DISCONTINUE! MORE COLORS

faceoff_negative.comments: I use to use the Penultimate eyeliner which I had been using for YEARS! Until MAC had the bright idea to discontinue it and replace it with this one I hate the felt brush it's all over the place what I loved about the Penultimate was that the felt tip was movable but firm so that it wasn't all over the place hate this eyeliner and can't find a replacement for my penultimate :(
faceoff_negative.headline: Terrible replacement
